product_name: CHANELLE ROUGE DUO ULTRA TENUE Ultrawear Liquid Lip Colour
summary: SummaryAn ultra-saturated liquid lipstick paired with a high-shine gloss for full-coverage, longwearing colour.
details: DetailsFeaturesInfused with micro-pigments and innovative polymers, the base glides on smoothly and dries quickly without feathering.The glossy top coat delivers comfortable, exceptional shine and superb hydration.Item 2532593How To UseGlide on the base coat with the built-in wand applicator. Allow a moment to dry, then use the brush applicator to apply the top coat for a brilliant result.IngredientsIsododecane, Bis-Hydroxyethoxypropyl Dimethicone/Ipdi Copolymer Ethylcarbamate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ethyl Vanillin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Laureth-4, Tin Oxide, [+ / - (May Contain), CI 12085 (Red 36), CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), CI 17200 (Red 33 Lake), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 45380 (Red 22 Lake), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 73360 (Red 30 Lake), CI 75470 (Carmine), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Mica], IL20A-IV, Dimethicone, IL38A-VII.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Glide on the base coat with the built-in wand applicator. Allow a moment to dry, then use the brush applicator to apply the top coat for a brilliant result.

reviews.headline: Love this!!!
reviews.comments: I've used this since probably 2001 and have had to change colors three times because of discontinuation. I use soft rose now, and really hope it doesn't get cancelled! It doesn't even feel like anything is on your lips and lasts for a long time!! I put on lip liner then IT cosmetics je ne sais and then the chanel color, let it dry and put on the clear side. I can change the color slightly by the lip liner I use!!

reviews.headline: Long lasting matte/shine
reviews.comments: I love this lipgloss. It is the only lipstick that stays on for the whole day and doesn't transfer on glass etc. the worse is wearing bright red or pink lipstick only to have it transfer when I have a drink or giving a kiss. This gives the color without the worry of transfer or fading. Stains and these type of lipglosses can be naturally matte, so they included a dual color with clear gloss for a desired shiny finish. I love the bright raspberry color. Perfect for the bright winter color seasons out there!

reviews.headline: Best lipstick ever
reviews.comments: I wish I have bought it before, love the color the texture the longevity everything probably going to buy a few more shades

reviews.headline: It really stays on!
reviews.comments: This is the 3rd lipstick I bought from this line. The staying power is really good. I drank coffee, ate and it was still on. I retouched it a little but could have left it at is. The color is beautiful and vibrant. I recommend it. I'm going to buy other colors.

reviews.headline: Worth the price
reviews.comments: I have been buying a drugstore brand lip tint for several years. When I saw the Chanel product, I wasn't sure I wanted to spend the money, but it was my birthday month. I am very impressed. This product stays on for hours, even after eating and drinking.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: Love the color and it stays on for hours. And I like that you can control the gloss level.

reviews.headline: It's 3:43pm and still on! Impressed!
reviews.comments:
I applied this at around 7:45am and its still on my lips! Through coffee, lunch and liquids it stayed! This was my first Chanel makeup purchase and all i can say is, buy it. 
In love!

reviews.headline: Longest Lasting Lip
reviews.comments: This really has the best lasting power of any lip product I've ever used. You do have to wait for the color to dry down a little before topping with gloss. But if you pair it with a good lip liner and apply it properly, it can last through evenings of eating, drinking, and chatting.

reviews.headline: It's ok
reviews.comments: I really love the color. It is glossy and it goes on super smooth. The only thing is that it didn't dry quickly if any or last long. It was long gone after an hour. It's not color stay at all and transfers to cups when drinking.

reviews.headline: What Happened to your Quality, Chanel?
reviews.comments: Doesn't apply evenly (cheap waxy formula), and does not last any longer than 2 hours.  Tried 2 times to apply and waited 10 minutes before applying the top coat, and still lasted no longer than 2 hours.  Chanel's prices went up but their quality tanked.  Very disappointed.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This is my favorite red (Daring Red), looks great on everyone! And once it's on it doesn't budge. I had it on for over 18 hours without a reapply the other day. However, the price keeps going up so I only buy it once a year.

reviews.headline: lovely color and stays on
reviews.comments: Tried this out as a recommended product from one of the beauty consultants. The color is perfect, and I'm very happy how long it stays on. The gloss is a nice addition as well.

reviews.headline: Wonderful and long lasting
reviews.comments: This is the best long lasting lipstick.  I have 5 or 6 colors and they really do last 12 hours.  After lunch, it isn't necessary to reapply!  The color is matte and somewhat drying but the gloss is moisturizing; apply in the morning and you're good all day!

reviews.headline: Absolutely love it
reviews.comments: Stays on all day. Put on in the am. And take off in the pm.

reviews.headline: Best ever
reviews.comments: This was easy to apply and lasted hours and hours. Went out for dinner, drinks, and lipstick stayed on strong through it all. And even with all that staying power, it wasn't even very drying.

reviews.headline: Longest lasting lip product
reviews.comments: I am a chainsmoker and this lip product lasted all day until I washed it off. I was blown away! The shine does slowly wear off foe the most part but you're still left with the color (and it doesn't look or feel dry) couldn't recommend enough!

reviews.headline: Best long wear lipstick on the market!
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for years now. The lipstick has great wearing power and the lip gloss does not smudge the lip color. I wish they would continue expanding the color options.

reviews.headline: The best.
reviews.comments: Long lasting and doesn't crackle or dry like other lip stains if clear gloss applied initially after product settles. I've bought this over twenty times and always receive compliments!

reviews.headline: The best long lasting lip stick
reviews.comments: This is the longest lasting lipstick with the nicest color options!!! People who dont like it, just dont know how to apply it. Use the color first, then the clear gloss and let your lips dry for like 15 minutes. Dont touch or rub together. Then boom, a lipstick that will last through eating, drinking and chatting. I have become so obsessed I have bought 7 in the past 2 months!!!!

reviews.headline: I will be buying another color by Chanel.
reviews.comments: This truly lasts longer than others.  So glad I was told to wait at least 7-10 seconds before putting in top coat.

properties.name: Pros

values.label: It last a long time! Color looks great!

display_values: It last a long time! Color looks great!

media.headline: I will buy this product again
media.caption: the photo shows this product

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have had eczema nearly of my life and these have been a gamechanger for me. They NEVER break me out. My lips look full, moisturized (as long as I put the gloss over it), and "put-together" with these products, especially at work! I only need to re-apply twice at most after eating and drinking. My favorites are Tender Beige (flattering rosy beige, mainly neutral), Intense Caramel (which is slightly pinker and has some shimmer compared to Intense Beige), Soft Rose (which looks like a medium-deep mauve beige on me), Light Brown (1990s-esque medium chocolate), and Soft Coral (the perfect, sunniest red-coral). Strawberry Red is the pinker version of Soft Coral; I have even tried Timeless Beige, which is pale compared to Tender Beige but looks amazing and blendable with a mauve, beige, or brown lipliner for versatile looks. Sensual Rose is a mildly muted creamy rose red, while Bright Raspberry appears to be its magenta counterpart. Merry Rose is a frosty pink that is nearly white; Milky Blueberry is very "purple-toned" while Intense Blueberry has hints of mauve, gray, and burgundy. Chic Rosewood is quite mauve depending on your undertone, and looks like the Le Rouge Duo of Chanel's Rouge Coco lipstick in Mademoiselle. I work in healthcare; I swear I don't for Chanel! But for someone with severe skin issues, these have been a dream for me, and I have gifted them to loved ones. 

What I do is apply the lipcolor first, wait 2-3 minutes, then put the gloss on top for a lasting look.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Lipcolor for My Sensitive Lips

faceoff_negative.comments: I put off buying this for a couple of years. It's expensive and doesn't seem like a lot of product but this is my lipstick preference. I like lipsticks with staying power. I use Maybelline Superstay but I just figured this Chanel would be so much better...maybe less tacky and a better color selection. So when my birthday rolled around I took my rewards points and took the plunge. I'm glad Ulta has such a good return policy and I hadn't purchased straight from Chanel's website. It's not opaque so you need to make several swipes. The one I got seemed dried up already because every time I dipped the applicator in the tube there would just be a little dab on it when I pulled it out, and again, it's not a lot of product to begin with. By afternoon, it was patchy. Sorry, but this is a hard pass for me. Used it twice and returned it.
faceoff_negative.headline: I had wanted this for so long

rollup.name: LE ROUGE DUO ULTRA TENUE Ultrawear Liquid Lip Colour
